name: Gasolineras de España
author: Gasolinera

sections.description:
Gasolineras de España is a flexible and easy-to-use plugin that allows you to display a beautiful gas station widget in your website without any coding skills.

Create a widget, select any location within Spain, choose the data and customize the look and feel with a few clicks.

KEY FEATURES

  • 11000 spanish gas stations available updated every hour.
  • Gas station info with current prices, distance, location and link to GPS.
  • Display up to 25 gas stations.
  • Order by distance or prices.
  • Fully responsive & mobile friendly.
  • Easy to use – No coding required.
  • Shortcodes.
  • Fully customizable. You can show or hide every element.
  • Widget can be styled individually. Choose font color, background, etc.
  • Translatable .pot file.

Gasolineras de España is a service provided by mejorgasolinera.com
sections.installation:
Manual installation

  • Download the zip file and extract the content
  • Upload the folder gasolineras-de-espana to your WP plugin folder /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Go to Plugins > Plugins, and activate the plugin

Widget

  • Go to Appearance > Widgets, and drag the widget to a sidebar
  • Configure your widget

Shortcode

  • Go to Appearance > Widgets, and drag the widget to a sidebar
  • Configure your widget
  • Copy the shortcode generated at bottom
  • Remove widget
  • Paste shortcode wherever you want

short_description: Widget that allows you to display gas stations in Spain and their prices on your website
